name: Hong Phuc Dang
short-biography: Internationally educated business professional with focus on open technologies, developer community outreach and business development. Extensive knowledge and technical expertise in information technologies, Open Source applications and developer community engagement.
long-biography: Internationally educated business professional with focus on open technologies, developer community outreach and business development. Extensive knowledge and technical expertise in information technologies, Open Source applications and developer community engagement.

name: Martin Andrews
short-biography: Experienced financial industry entrepreneur. Now relocated to Singapore to get back to the Machine Learning roots of my PhD years.
long-biography: Experienced financial industry entrepreneur. Now relocated to Singapore to get back to the Machine Learning roots of my PhD years.

sessions.title: Deep Learning: From Inception to Dreams
